channel.title: summit on Kuldeep Singh
channel.description: Recent content in summit on Kuldeep Singh

item.title: Speaker | Gatherverse Book Summit 2025
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸ“¢ Gatherverse Book Summit 2025: Exploring Books, Language and Meaning in the Age of New Technology. In the intersection of emerging technologies and humanity, this GatherVerse event aims to deep dive into the current and future state of books in an age defined by artificial intelligence. This is a space for authors, researchers, engineers, ethicists, educators, publishers, technologists and readers. We explore what it means to write, publish, and trust books in a time where machine-generated language is flooding the landscape

item.title: Speaker | Pre AI Impact Summit: Openness in AI
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: India will host the AI Impact Summit 2026, reaffirming its commitment to making Artificial Intelligence (AI) accessible and beneficial for the public good. The event will explore how AI can address real-world challenges in healthcare, education, agriculture, climate change, and governanceâ€”building on the momentum of global gatherings like the AI Action Summit France, AI Seoul Summit, and AI Safety Summit. As part of the lead-up to the summit, OpenUK and OpenHQ have been hosting pre-summit events to spark conversations around AI openness.

item.title: Speaker - Gatherverse XREvolve Summit 2025 | AI and XR
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: XREvolve Summit serves a comprehensive platform for exploring the latest advancements, applications, applied sciences and progresses within AI, AR, VR, and the broader domains of the metaverse such as spatial computing. It is backed by Gatherverse community, that advocates humanity-first standards in accessibility, education, equality, community development, safety & privacy, wellness, and ethics within the metaverse and emerging technologies. This year’s focus is AR and AI: The Intersection of the Future, that open up the extraordinary and near limitless possibilities for humanity.

item.title: Speaker - Gatherverse Summit 2025
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸ“¢ Gatherverse Summit 2025: Innovating for Human Betterment Now and Forever. Climb. GatherVerse Summit 2025 marks the fourth annual gathering of global experts and community leaders discussing humanity-first standards in the approach to AI, the metaverse, and emerging technologies I’m excited to be part of the Roundtable Panel Discussion on “The Metaverse United : How AI and XR Can Deepen Human Connections” alongside industry leaders and innovators! ðŸ—“ Session Details Date & Time: Feb 25, 2025, 11:20 AM - 12:10 PM PST Roundtable Panel: The Metaverse United : How AI and XR Can Deepen Human Connections Moderator: Lynn Gitau - Director of Communications, Gatherverse Panelists: Casey Jensen - Head of Client Partnerships, Zebrar Kuldeep Singh - Me David B.

item.title: Immersive AI at IPOS 2024: Transforming the Process Sector
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: IPOS 2024 was an inspiring technology summit focused on the innovations, digitalization, and disruptions shaping the downstream oil & gas, petrochemicals, fertilizers, and process manufacturing sectors. The event provided deep insights into operational excellence, optimization, Industry 4.0, sustainability, safety, and more. Hosted alongside the Digitalization & Automation Technology Summit and Expo (DATs 2024) by the Institute of Technological Excellence (ITEx), this summit brought together downstream industry leaders and technologists to exchange knowledge and ideas.

item.title: Speaker - Gatherverse Virtual World Symposium 2024
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: ðŸ“¢ Virtual World Symposium: Join us as we dive deep into the future of AI-powered virtual worlds: What are they? Where are they headed? And why is it crucial to discuss these transformative spaces to..day? This symposium will also unpack spatial intelligence and its role in defining and enhancing immersive environments. As we step into a new era of digital interaction, this event will provide insights into the challenges and opportunities that virtual worlds bring to society.

item.title: Speaker - Gatherverse XREvolve Summit 2024
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: XREvolve Summit serves a comprehensive platform for exploring the latest advancements, applications, applied sciences and progresses within AR, VR, and the broader domains of the metaverse such as spatial computing and mixed reality. It is backed by Gatherverse community, that advocates humanity-first standards in accessibility, education, equality, community development, safety & privacy, wellness, and ethics within the metaverse and emerging technologies. This year’s focus is XR : Interface of AI, that open up the extraordinary and near limitless possibilities for humanity.

item.title: Panelist at FICCI XROS Fellowship Summit
item.author: thinkuldeep@gmail.com (Kuldeep Singh)
item.description: Welcome to Internet 3.0, the transformative era where reality takes on new dimensions, driven by eXtending Reality (XR) at it’s core, along with AI, Cloud, IoT, and more. This evolution would be the product of collaborative efforts involving academia, government, industry, and individuals. I recently had the privilege of participating as a panelist at an event hosted by the pioneers shaping the future of the internet. In this article, I share my insights and a summary of this remarkable event.
